text: Skazhi (o poslannik!): "O lyudi! Skazhite mne, yesli Allakh sdelayet noch' vechnoy do Dnya voskreseniya, to kakoy bog, krome Allakha, smozhet prinesti vam siyaniye sveta dnya, kogda vy mozhete rabotat' i zanimat'sya svoimi delami?! Net takogo! Pochemu zhe vy ne prislushayetes' k istine i ne urazumeyete
